EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: Test RRRP Survey
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Workflow] Test RRRP Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Please complete this survey: Test RRRP Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please complete this survey at:
{!IF(Contact.Id != null,IF(Case.Id != null,'http://iava.force.com/survey/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0iC0000007tbUcIAI&cId='+Contact.Id+'&case_id='+Case.Id+'&wf=yes','http://iava.force.com/survey/timbasurveys__survey?id=a0iC0000007tbUcIAI&cId='+Contact.Id+'&wf=yes'),'')}
